DOC.criteria: Patients septic shock criterion : At least two follow criterion : temperature < 36 ° C > 38 ° C , heart rate > 90 beat / minute , respiratory rate > 20 breath / minute PaCO2 < 32mmHg , leukocytes > 12,000 / mm3 < 4000 / mm3 Refractory Hypotension ( blood pressure < 90mmHg need norepinephrine ) lactate ≥ 4 mmol / L Age < 18years Patients preexist neuromuscular disease Pregnancy Moribund patient early therapeutic limitation Patients seizure last 6 month
